main event: A sighting of an unidentified object resembling a balloon with a white light was reported at Eglin Air Force Base on August 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 minutes,The sighting involved one object,It was described as round like a balloon with only a white light visible,No sound was heard during the observation,The conclusion drawn was that it was likely just light from a standard balloon.
sighted object: one object resembling a balloon with a white light
location: Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, USA
witness description: military personnel including dispatchers and control tower operators
